data.title: Italo Club Executive
data.meta_description: Discover the perks of Italo Club Executive, the most exclusive class offered by Italo train, and book your Premium First Class train tickets in advance with us.
data.text:
Club Executive is Italo's version of Premium First Class, offering the most exclusive benefits and guaranteeing the best travel experience, with maximum comfort, space, privacy and entertainment.

Italo Club Executive allows you to travel in style with:

Fast Track priority entrance

Free access to the Italo Club Lounge

Complimentary drinks and snacks

9" personal screens available

Free unlimited WiFi

Onboard entertainment portal

Option to book Italo Salotto

Free WiFi

Complimentary drinks & snacks

The Club Executive class is equipped with large, comfortable, reclining leather armchairs, which guarantee extra legroom. That’s not all – every seat is equipped with personal 9" screens and power outlets to recharge your electronic devices. Thanks to the free WiFi, you can surf the internet or access the ItaloLive on-board entertainment portal, with a wide range of films, TV series, podcasts, music, and news.

If you’re feeling hungry or thirsty, you can enjoy the dedicated on-board catering service with espresso coffee and a rich selection of delicious bakery products served directly to your seat. Furthermore, you can book your seat in the Italo Salotto, an onboard lounge where you can enjoy additional privacy and comfort.

Don't forget, in some stations, you can access the Italo Club Lounge for free, where you can enjoy free WiFi, as well as hot and cold drinks as you wait for your train to arrive. Ready to go? You can skip the queues by taking advantage of the Fast Track access to the train.

Fast Track

When traveling in Italo Club Executive, you can use Italo's "Fast Track" service. With Italo Fast Track you can skip the queue, save time at check-in and reach your train directly thanks to a dedicated entrance. The service is available at Milano Centrale station in Milan, at Gate E, and Roma Termini station in Rome on platform 12. Fast Track can also be extended to children if they travel with a valid ticket.

If you want to buy an Italo Club Executive ticket, simply start a search in our Journey Planner and enter your departure station, arrival station and the date you want to travel. Select the Italo train of your choice and the first-class price option. In the 'Comfort' section, select the 'Club Executive' option. You’ll also see the price difference between Standard and First Class before completing your purchase.

You can travel in Club Executive class with any type of ticket (Flex, Economy or Low Cost) depending on your flexibility needs.
